articles.title: Body found in Tesla car linked to D4vd identified as missing teen - BBC
articles.description: Authorities say the cause and time of the 15-year-old girl's death are still unknown.
articles.content:
A decomposing body found in a car registered to singer D4vd has been identified as a missing 15-year-old girl, US authorities say.
Police officers discovered the remains of Celeste Rivas inside the … [+1522 chars]

articles.author: Brian Tallerico
articles.title: Judd Hirsch on Robert Redford: ‘We Ran Along With Him and His Ideas’ - Rolling Stone
articles.description: 'Ordinary People' star Judd Hirsch remembers Robert Redford: "We ran along with Redford and his movies and his ideas ... We lost one of the biggies."
articles.content: Now a legend in his own right, Judd Hirsch wasn’t an expected choice to star in a Best Picture winner in 1980. But he was tapped to play Dr. Tyrone Berger in the directorial debut of the biggest movi… [+3707 chars]
